document.full_text: the imf warned greece on wednesday that it would fail to shore up its finances unless it redoubled reform efforts, and euro zone officials dismissed suggestions that a mild debt restructuring might help.
document.title: imf says greece must "reinvigorate" reform drive
lines_and_colors: the imf warned greece on wednesday that it would fail to shore up its finances unless it redoubled reform efforts, and euro zone officials dismissed suggestions that a mild debt restructuring might help.
